---|---|---  
Nov 2023 | Insider Trading Policy | [![Download file: Insider Trading Policy](https://www.n2off.com/wp-content/uploads/pdf.svg)](https://www.n2off.com/wp-content/uploads/Save-Foods-Insider-Trading-Policy-November-12-2023.pdf)  
May 2021 | Audit Committee Charter | [![Download file: Audit Committee Charter](https://www.n2off.com/wp-content/uploads/pdf.svg)](https://www.n2off.com/wp-content/uploads/Save-Foods-Audit-Committee-Charter_May2021.pdf)  
May 2021 | Code of Business Conduct and Ethics | [![Download file: Code of Business Conduct and Ethics](https://www.n2off.com/wp-content/uploads/pdf.svg)](https://www.n2off.com/wp-content/uploads/Save-Foods-Code-of-Business-Conduct-and-Ethics_May2021.pdf)  
May 2021 | Compensation Committee Charter | [![Download file: Compensation Committee Charter](https://www.n2off.com/wp-content/uploads/pdf.svg)](https://www.n2off.com/wp-content/uploads/Save-Foods-Compensation-Committee-Charter_May2021.pdf)  
May 2021 | Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee Charter | [![Download file: Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee Charter](https://www.n2off.com/wp-content/uploads/pdf.svg)](https://www.n2off.com/wp-content/uploads/Save-Foods-Nominating-and-Corporate-Governance-Committee-Charter_May2021.pdf)  
May 2021 | Whistleblowing Policy | [![Download file: Whistleblowing Policy](https://www.n2off.com/wp-content/uploads/pdf.svg)](https://www.n2off.com/wp-content/uploads/Save-Foods-Whistleblowing-Policy_May2021.pdf)
